name: Rescue at Skull Rock
description:
Title: Rescue at Skull Rock 

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: This is an adaptation of the LEGO Microgame build on Unity. In my version your friend has been captured by a dark wizard. You must free him but, BEWARE! The wizard and his minions will try to stop you! There are some gnomes on the islands, talk to them if you need help.

Instructions: Use WASD or arrow keys to move around. Use the space bar to jump and double jump. Use the mouse or track pad to look around. Use TAB to pause and see options. You must free your friend from the cage on top of Skull Rock. 

Game Design Team 

Bridget Kurr – Game Designer
